main event: At least 33 witnesses observed a very bright, elliptical aerial object moving slowly across the sky in Falls Church, Virginia.
interesting points: The object was described as being about the size of a Cessna aircraft at an altitude of 800 to 1000 feet.,It appeared to remain motionless for several minutes.,Witnesses claimed the object accelerated to a speed exceeding 2000 mph before disappearing.,The object had no visible wings or fins.,The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
